divs: Sighting Details1. Sitting outside on my front steps around 1115 pm2. The brightness3. Comet4. Followed it across the sky and was not believing what i was seeing.5. Made a path across the sky in a line was very brightup close, was movingextremely fast, faded as it got father away. It was there, then it was gonealmost as fas as we saw it.6.Was moving so fast, faded. The 2nd thing smaller, was moving behind it, itseemed farther away, but on the same path.
